name: nextcloud-tables
tagline: A low code table and data app for Nextcloud
description: Nextcloud Tables allows users to create database-like tables with custom fields, filtering, and permissions directly in Nextcloud. It's ideal for low-code data tracking within a self-hosted ecosystem.

features.title: Data Filtering
features.description: Filter rows by column values with multiple conditions and operators

features.title: Row Management
features.description: Add, edit, delete, and duplicate rows with spreadsheet-like interface

features.title: Sharing And Permissions
features.description: Share tables with users or groups with view or edit access

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Load data from CSV files or export tables for backup and analysis

features.title: Views And Layouts
features.description: Create different views of the same data with custom filters and columns
